question:
Which of the following statements are correct about Saola?
1. It is one of the world's rarest large mammals also known as siola, Vu Quang ox, spindlehorn, Asian unicorn.
2. It is found only in the Annamite Range of Vietnam and Laos.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Saola is one of the world's rarest large mammals also known as siola, Vu Quang ox, spindlehorn, Asian unicorn. It is found only in the Annamite Range of Vietnam and Laos.
